title: A Walk-on Actor Who Wants to Be A Baker - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Orphans   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Showbiz
author: Xu Banxian   许半仙
description:
As a walk-on actor, he had been the mistress of his sugar daddy for three years. However, they had only met each other for a few times.

As a boss, his sugar daddy has tons of lovers.

The walk-on actor: The cake shop is the only thing I love in this world. Lovers? Never want one.

The boss: No problem. Nobody wants that.

Then, they fell in love with each other…>
